rules.description: Control spotify volume with control + volume keys

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if application "Spotify" is running then' -e 'tell application "Spotify"' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume + 5' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if'
osascript -e 'if application "Spotify" is running then' -e 'tell application "Spotify"' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume - 5' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if'

rules.description: Control spotify volume with cmd + F14/F15

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if application "Spotify" is running then' -e 'tell application "Spotify"' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume + 5' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if'
osascript -e 'if application "Spotify" is running then' -e 'tell application "Spotify"' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume - 5' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if'

rules.description: Control spotify volume with cmd + pause/scroll lock

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if application "Spotify" is running then' -e 'tell application "Spotify"' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume + 5' -e 'end tell' -e 'end if'
